The game crashes in attempt to announce the game for coop. To stop the crashes, switch the game type to 'single player' or leave it 'cooperative', but with visibility to 'LAN' (not 'online'). Have a good zombie time!

Crash fix!!!

I did the following things and game stopped crashing. some of the steps might not be required but I did them all.
1.Run the game as administrator.
2.In the main menu go to options>online> change game type to single player.
and it stopped crashing for me.I even changed texture settings to medium rest all maxedout. I don't think it mattered but since i did it I mentioned it.

Happy gaming

ok I figured it out! here is how to import your dead island game save: copy one of your game save files (the date indicates the most recent) from here: C:Program FilesDead Islandoutsave then copy and paste it to here: C:ProgramDataRELOADEDRLD!216250storageoutsave and VOILA!

ok I figured it out! here is how to import your dead island game save: copy one of your game save files (the date indicates the most recent) from here: C:Program Files-Dead Island-out-save then copy and paste it to here: C:ProgramData-RELOADED-RLD!-216250-storage-out-save and VOILA!
